channel.title: Apache SkyWalking â€“ Events
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Apache SkyWalking

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking Python 0.4.0
item.description:
SkyWalking Python 0.4.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Feature: Support Kafka reporter protocol (#74)
  • BugFix: Move generated packages into skywalking namespace to avoid conflicts (#72)
  • BugFix: Agent cannot reconnect after server is down (#79)
  • Test: Mitigate unsafe yaml loading (#76)

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking Client JS 0.2.0
item.description:
SkyWalking Client JS 0.2.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Bug Fixes
    • Fixed a bug in sslTime calculate.
    • Fixed a bug in server response status judgment.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking Cloud on Kubernetes 0.1.0
item.description:
SkyWalking Cloud on Kubernetes 0.1.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Add OAPServer CRDs and controller.

item.title: Events: Welcome Jiapeng Liu as new committer
item.description: Based on his continuous contributions, Jiapeng Liu (a.k.a evanljp) has been voted as a new committer.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking Kubernetes Helm Chart 4.0.0
item.description:
SkyWalking Kubernetes Helm Chart 4.0.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Allow overriding configurations files under /skywalking/config.
  • Unify the usages of different SkyWalking versions.
  • Add Values for init container in case of using private regestry.
  • Add services, endpoints resources in ClusterRole.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking Client JS 0.1.0
item.description:
SkyWalking Client JS 0.1.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Support Browser Side Monitoring. Require SkyWalking APM 8.2+.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking APM 8.2.0
item.description:
SkyWalking 8.2.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Support Browser Side Monitoring
  • Query Traces by Tags
  • Introduce Meter Analysis Language
  • Allow Configuring Composite Alert Rules

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking LUA Nginx 0.3.0
item.description:
SkyWalking LUA Nginx 0.3.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Load the base64 module in utils, different ENV use different library.
  • Add prefix skywalking, avoid conflicts with other lua libraries.
  • Chore: only expose the method of setting random seed, it is optional.
  • Coc: use correct code block type.
  • CI: add upstream_status to tag http.status
  • Add http.status

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking CLI 0.4.0
item.description:
SkyWalking CLI 0.4.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Features
    • Add dashboard global command with auto-refresh
    • Add dashboard global-metrics command
    • Add traces search
    • Refactor metrics thermodynamic command to adopt the new query protocol
  • Bug Fixes
    • Fix wrong golang standard time

item.title: Events: Welcome Huaxi Jiang as new committer
item.description: Based on his continuous contributions, Huaxi Jiang (a.k.a fgksgf) has been voted as a new committer.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking Python 0.3.0
item.description:
SkyWalking Python 0.3.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • New plugins

    • Urllib3 Plugin (#69)
    • Elasticsearch Plugin (#64)
    • PyMongo Plugin (#60)
    • Rabbitmq Plugin (#53)
    • Make plugin compatible with Django (#52)

  • API

    • Add process propagation (#67)
    • Add tags to decorators (#65)
    • Add Check version of packages when install plugins (#63)
    • Add thread propagation (#62)
    • Add trace ignore (#59)
    • Support snapshot context (#56)
    • Support correlation context (#55)

  • Chores and tests

    • Test: run multiple versions of supported libraries (#66)
    • Chore: add pull request template for plugin (#61)
    • Chore: add dev doc and reorganize the structure (#58)
    • Test: update test health check (#57)
    • Chore: add make goal to package release tar ball (#54)

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking Chart 3.1.0 for SkyWalking 8.1.0
item.description:
SkyWalking Chart 3.1.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Support SkyWalking 8.1.0
  • Support enable oap dynamic configuration through k8s configmap

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking APM 8.1.0
item.description:
SkyWalking APM 8.1.0 is release. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Support Kafka as an optional trace, JVM metrics, profiling snapshots and meter system data transport layer.
  • Support Meter system, including the native metrics APIs and the Spring Sleuth adoption.
  • Support JVM thread metrics.

item.title: Events: Welcome Wei Hua as new committer
item.description: Based on his continuous contributions, Wei Hua (a.k.a alonelaval) has been voted as a new committer.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking Python 0.2.0
item.description:
SkyWalking Python 0.2.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Plugins:

    • Kafka Plugin (#50)
    • Tornado Plugin (#48)
    • Redis Plugin (#44)
    • Django Plugin (#37)
    • PyMsql Plugin (#35)
    • Flask plugin (#31)

  • API

    • Add ignore_suffix Config (#40)
    • Add missing log method and simplify test codes (#34)
    • Add content equality of SegmentRef (#30)
    • Validate carrier before using it (#29)

  • Chores and tests

    • Test: print the diff list when validation failed (#46)
    • Created venv builders for linux/windows and req flashers + use documentation (#38)

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking CLI 0.3.0
item.description:
SkyWalking CLI 0.3.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Command: health check command
  • Command: Add trace command
  • BugFix: Fix wrong metrics graphql path

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking Python 0.1.0
item.description:
SkyWalking Python 0.1.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • API: agent core APIs, check the APIs and the examples
  • Plugin: built-in libraries http, urllib.request and third-party library requests are supported.
  • Test: agent test framework is setup, and the corresponding tests of aforementioned plugins are also added.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking Chart 3.0.0 for SkyWalking 8.0.1
item.description:
SkyWalking Chart 3.0.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Support SkyWalking 8.0.1

item.title: Events: Relase Apache SkyWalking Nginx LUA 0.2.0
item.description:
SkyWalking Nginx LUA 0.2.0 is release. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Adapt the new v3 protocol.
  • Implement correlation protocol.
  • Support batch segment report.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking APM 8.0.0
item.description:
SkyWalking APM 8.0.0 is release. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • v3 protocol is added and implemented
  • New Dashboard UI and new Query Protocol are provided
  • Prometheus fetcher is supported. Once you have Prometheus SDK instrumented app, the metrics could be read by SkyWalking.
  • Register mechanism has been removed due to buckets effect on performance and memory cost.

item.title: Events: Welcome Wei Zhang to join the PMC
item.description: Based on his continuous contributions, Wei Zhang (a.k.a arugal) has been invited to join the PMC. Welcome aboard.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking Chart 2.0.0 for SkyWalking 7.0.0
item.description:
SkyWalking Chart 2.0.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Support SkyWalking 7.0.0
  • Support set ES user/password
  • Add CI for release

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking APM 7.0.0
item.description:
SkyWalking APM 7.0.0 is release. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Upgrade JDK minimal JDK requirement to JDK8
  • Support profiling code level performance
  • Don’t support SkyWalking v5 agent in-wire and out-wire protocol. V6 is required.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking CLI 0.2.0
item.description:
SkyWalking CLI 0.2.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Support visualization of heat map
  • Support top N entities, swctl metrics top 5 --name service_sla
  • Support thermodynamic metrics, swctl metrics thermodynamic --name all_heatmap
  • Support multiple linear metrics, swctl --display=graph --debug metrics multiple-linear --name all_percentile

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking Chart 1.1.0 for SkyWalking 6.6.0
item.description:
SkyWalking Chart 1.1.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  • Support SkyWalking 6.6.0
  • Support deploy Elasticsearch 7
  • The official helm repo was changed to the official Elasticsearch repo (https://helm.elastic.co/)

item.title: Events: SkyWalking Nginx LUA 0.1.0 release
item.description: Support tracing and collect metrics from Nginx server. Require SkyWalking APM 7.0+.

item.title: Events: Welcome Ming Wen as new committer
item.description: Based on his continuous contributions, Ming Wen (a.k.a moonming) has been voted as a new committer.

item.title: Events: Welcome Haochao Zhuang to join the PMC
item.description: Based on his continuous contributions, Haochao Zhuang (a.k.a dmsolr) has been invited to join the PMC. Welcome aboard.

item.title: Events: Welcome Zhusheng Xu as new committer
item.description: Based on his continuous contributions, Zhusheng Xu (a.k.a aderm) has been voted as a new committer.

item.title: Events: Welcome Han Liu as new committer
item.description: Based on his continuous contributions, Han Liu (a.k.a mrproliu) has been voted as a new committer.

item.title: Events: Welcome Hongwei Zhai to join the PMC
item.description: Based on his continuous contributions, Hongwei Zhai (a.k.a innerpeacez) has been invited to join the PMC. Welcome aboard.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking APM 6.6.0
item.description:
Apache APM 6.6.0 release. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  1. Service Instance dependency detection are available.
  2. Support ElasticSearch 7 as a storage option.
  3. Reduce the register load.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking Chart 1.0.0 for SkyWalking 6.5.0
item.description:
SkyWalking Chart 1.0.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  1. Deploy SkyWalking 6.5.0 by Chart.
  2. Elasticsearch deploy optional.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking CLI 0.1.0
item.description:
SkyWalking CLI 0.1.0 is released. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  1. Add command swctl service to list services
  2. Add command swctl instance and swctl search to list and search instances of service.
  3. Add command swctl endpoint to list endpoints of service.
  4. Add command swctl linear-metrics to query linear metrics and plot the metrics in Ascii Graph mode.
  5. Add command swctl single-metrics to query single-value metrics.

item.title: Events: Welcome Weiyi Liu as new committer
item.description: Based on his continuous contributions, Weiyi Liu (a.k.a wayilau) has been voted as a new committer.

item.title: Events: Welcome Lang Li as a new committer
item.description: Based on his contributions to the project, he has been accepted as SkyWalking committer. Welcome aboard.

item.title: Events: Welcome Qiuxia Fan as new committer
item.description: Based on her continuous contributions, Qiuxia Fan (a.k.a Fine0830) has been voted as a new committer.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking APM 6.5.0
item.description:
6.5.0 release. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  1. New metrics comparison view in UI.
  2. Dynamic Alert setting supported.
  3. JDK9-12 supported in backend.

item.title: Events: Welcome Wei Zhang as new committer
item.description: Based on his continuous contributions, Wei Zhang (a.k.a arugal) has been voted as a new committer.

item.title: Events: Welcome Haochao Zhuang as new committer
item.description: Based on his continuous contributions, Haochao Zhuang (a.k.a dmsolr) has been voted as a new committer.

item.title: Events: Welcome Weijie Zou as a new committer
item.description: Based on his contributions to the skywalking ui project, Weijie Zou (a.k.a Kdump) has been accepted as a new committer.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking APM 6.4.0
item.description:
6.4.0 release. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  1. Highly recommend to upgrade due to Pxx metrics calculation bug.
  2. Make agent working in JDK9+ Module system.

Read changelog for the details.

item.title: Events: Welcome Yuguang Zhao to join the PMC
item.description: Based on his continuous contributions, Yuguang Zhao (a.k.a zhaoyuguang) has been invited to join the PMC. Welcome aboard.

item.title: Events: Welcome Zhenxu Ke to join the PMC
item.description: Based on his continuous contributions, Zhenxu Ke (a.k.a kezhenxu94) has been invited to join the PMC. Welcome aboard.

item.title: Events: Welcome Yanlong He as a new committer
item.description: Based on his contributions to the skywalking PHP project, Yanlong He (a.k.a heyanlong has been accepted as a new committer.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking APM 6.3.0
item.description:
6.3.0 release. Go to downloads page to find release tars.

  1. Improve ElasticSearch storage implementation performance again.
  2. OAP backend re-install w/o agent reboot required.

Read changelog for the details.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking APM 6.2.0
item.description:
6.2.0 release. Go to downloads page to find release tars. ElasticSearch storage implementation changed, high reduce payload to ElasticSearch cluster.

Read changelog for the details.

item.title: Events: Welcome Zhenxu Ke as a new committer
item.description: Based on his continuous contributions, Zhenxu Ke (a.k.a kezhenxu94) has been voted as a new committer.

item.title: Events: Release Apache SkyWalking APM 6.1.0
item.description:
6.1.0 release. Go to downloads page to find release tars. This is the first top level project version.

Key updates

  1. RocketBot UI
  2. OAP performance improvement

item.title: Events: RocketBot UI has been accepted as SkyWalking primary UI
item.description: Apache SkyWalking PMC accept the RocketBot UI contributions. After IP clearance, it will be released in SkyWalking 6.1 soon.
